Requirements for Destroying FTI
FTI must be destroyed by being
burned in an incinerator that produces enough heat to burn the entire bundle
shredded into
1 mm x 5 mm pieces using crosscut shredders, or
pulverized/disintegrated using a disintegrator device equipped with a 3/32-inch security screen.
Note
:Â  Microfilm and microfiche must be destroyed by burning.
